description.@en: I leave my opinions at my shop’s door, which allows me to slip into whatever mannerisms endear me to my customers.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: Whenever using Skill Tests to interact with those of the same or different Allegiance, you gain an Assist Die.
